flawed_nl_solution:
Being 7019 km the distance from Spain to Russia. To get from Germany to Russia, Peter has to travel 7019 - 1615 = <<7019-1615=4504>>4504 km
Knowing both distances, Peter will answer that he has to fly 4504 + 7019 = <<4504+7019=11523>>11523 km
#### 11523

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5404, not 4504. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
